message.body: Hiiii! We were beat after a day adventuring around Waterbury and Stowe and fell asleep so early last night. Going to the skinny pancake in a lil buy for a last massive dose of delicious food.
Im at work til 3, it was great to see you this weekend!
You too! Thank you for being so wonderful too!
We'll be working on this for a while so feel free to email/text/call with more thoughts and keep me posted as the show progresses!
Also let me know what the final show dates are. I'll try to make my way up here
